content.detailedDescription:
in a forest park outsite of indianapolis city. this event ocurred on september 1997. 

about 4:30-5:00 pm. i was siting in my car, writing poetry. then a saw over me something like a cloud, but when i took a very good look at it, i notice i was a ufo over me. for about 2 minutes the ufo just hover over me, like a big a cloud; i was in shok at firts. the color of the ufo was grey-dark-plane: no lights, no windows. only something like pipes on the bottong of the object. this ufo was circular, perfect circular, but in the botton i saw pipes. i am sorry because my english is not to good to describe what i saw that day.

but, any way, after 2 minutes the ufo hovering over me, i got out of my car to take a beter look, and in that moment the ufo take off and just desapear on the sky.

days after this event i start to realice that my poetry was much better, so i finish my book of poetry. and not only that one, but more books of poetry. now, this is my story. today, i live in miami, florida.

now i will like to report this event that happen to my brother. this picture was take in a warehouse store. in the picture is my brother, and in the back, there is something like grey-figure, next to my brother...

we will like to you to analize this pictures, and if you see what we see, please let us know. thanks
content.summary: I was in my car, parking outsite the city of indianapolis, in the forets, writing poetry,then i saw something above my car roof, like a cloud, but then i saw it was a ufo over me

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures on and off through the night of the 5 of may. i take pictures and star watch often. while taking pictures of the moon after 1 am i caught a light in my pics that i knew immediately to be something strange. i just held still in excitement and awe and just kept clicking. as quick as i seen it it disappeared on me.  the whole thing lasted seconds. i dont think it went away. i think the light it was emitting (red) just stopped. i would be interested to see if maybe it is in the rest of my pics. i havent altered them in any way. i dont want to play with contrast or anything on them till they are properly examined.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light around moon then changed direction flew then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Outside at night looking at the full moon on may5th 2012 @ 9:45pm and 5 orange objects come across the sky out of the sw direction travelling ne 

first one comes across at approxamtely 9:50pm and seems to be travelling about 200 miles per hour and a minute later another one comes by and the another 3 come by about a minute apart from each other

strange
content.summary: 5 round red/orange glowing objects following in each other rather quickly about 30to 60 seconds apart,  traveling north, no sound at all.

content.detailedDescription: So last night i was in my room with my girlfriend. shes on the computer playing a game..Im in my bed watching her, my dog starts trying to get my attention. he wants to go outside so i let him out, but as i do so i realize the moon is shinning very brightly and recall hearing something about a fullest moon of the year or something a day or two before hand. so anyway i walk outside with my dog and check out the moon. i stand next to my pool and look up directly at the moon and as im doing this i catch something moving in the corner of my eye. i look closer and i see this boomerrang shaped object flying in a straight line across the sky..No lights..No sound..Nothing. i had a number of emotions like surge through me at that point an time, mostly i felt somewhat scared or frightened. the craft passed over my house and as this time i go back inside to get my girlfriend so she can see this craft. but by the time we got back outside it was gone=(. she says she believes me lol i've told my mother of course she doesnt nor does anyone else=(
content.summary: Black boomerange shaped craft flying over my house. no lights, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
First saw the bright orange glowing light / orb when i looked out the sliding glass doors to our apartment patio. our apartment is a little over mid way up a 22 story high rise. i looked out the windows and saw an unusual orange light slowing moving by. i had no idea what i was looking at. when i first saw it, it had just come over the top of our apartment building moving south to north. our apartment faces west and north. it was a bright orange glowing orb. there was no physical ball or shape apparent, just the very bright orange glowing light. when i first saw it i could see what i can best describe as an aura. it was cloudy outside, but the ball was just under the cloud cover. according to an online weather site, the cloud cover was 800 feet. at one point it appeared to go through a small batch of clouds, but not to a point it was not visible. i watched it move along a straight line to the north until i could not see it any more. i would say the distance traveled before it went out of sight was 10+ miles, probably due to the cloud cover and light pollution. it had a very graceful glide to it and it was probably a little under a minute before i could not see it any more. we are in the city and there is an enormous amount of light pollution. we have to look very hard just to see the couple stars that are sometimes visible. when the orb was closest to us it appeared to move around or bob a little bit, but not veer off it's course.
we see a lot of helicopters and smaller planes fly around, but this was not a helicopter or plane. it was too orange to be any aircraft and it was silent. i am a night owl and it is not unusual for me to be up at 3:00 a.M. we have lived in this apartment for almost 4.5 years and have never seen anything like this before. my husband saw it as well. he went to get the unready camera and binoculars for viewing. we did not have a card in the camera and by the time i got it in it was too far away for a photo. if i had it when i first saw it, i would have had a great photo.
content.summary: Orange glowing ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were in the living room, someone pointed out that there was a weird looking "star" outside.So a few of us decided to go check it out outside and the "star" was pulsating a red-orange color. this night, there were clouds in the sky and the moon happened to be extra large that night. i could see only a few stars in the sky. and they seemed to be in pairs of two. the red-orange "star" that we first spotted then started to "wiggle" around, more like hover around in a "u" shape. not just a little but an obvious amount of movement. that's really when i noticed the other objects in the sky. the one opposite of it, (same color and size) started up and that one stopped (for a few hours), and this new one started doing the same thing in only a matter or ten minutes or so. then we saw it jet off to the left of it. holding your hand to the sky a whole finger away. and not just hover over there it was fast! then it just continued to hover and move around for awhile. now two out of five people that were outside that night, saw one of the "stars" drop a small white looking light. they each saw it a different time in about an hours time. i am not sure exactly what these are, and i am not sure any one else knows either but i have a good feeling that these were not man made. i can go on about this for ahwile but here is the short n sweet verison. 



*note: this is a small town so there are hardly ever any helicopters, airplanes, or anything in the air.... and they never made any noise. if it were any of the following it'd be an echo through the valley.
content.summary: Red-orange glow in sky, hovering in a "u" shape and pulsating!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my mom who was visiting boise at the time and we where going to go to cascade, id to go to the gold fork's hot springs......We called to see if they would be open that night and found out that they would be closed at 10 which was only 1 hour from then.......We got to highway 55 i believe when we called to verify the time and found out that it was too late to go and visit so we turned around.   heading back towards the capitol on state street between walmart and the park/golfcourse near i believe veterans memorial way.....Not sure the exact name of the road.  the sigh ting all took place in between that area.  as we where driving my mom said "oh my god, what is that?"  i looked up from concentrating on the road and traffic around me to see in amayzement a very large distinct flying redish orange orb.  this orb was hovering in the vecinety above the power lines to the left of the road.  it was atleast 100 to 200 feet above the ground.  it was still light outside well enough to easily see what it was.  i was surprised that the other traffic on state street in that area didn't stop or slow down to get a better look.  i found it odd.  this took place for maybe a minute or two before all of a sudden the giant unmistakable orb vanished into thin air.  just as the orb had vanished my mother and i saw this tiny round disk shaped object float over the foothills.  it didn't have a normal trajectory that most flying objects tend to have.  it seemed to randomly move in a jagged motion as it maid it's way over the foot hills.  shortly after it had vanished over the foot hills the sky quickly became dark in a matter of minutes.  i found it quite odd how quickly it got dark after the sighting.  i don't recall any lapsed time while observing this event, but am contemplating having regressive hynosis done to me to try and recount the event in greater detail.
content.summary: Hovering bright redish orange orb which was very large that vanished and then turned into a tiny silver disc

content.detailedDescription:
Driving on 24 west in between oakland and berkeley california. the objects we moving very slowly and of a diamond shaped tiled structure.  there was an amorphous orange/red glow to them.  the three of us in the car were stunned because it was unlike anything we've ever seen in the sky.  two of us could clearly see it was a diamond shape.  if i was not driving 65 miles an hour on the highway i would have pulled over and tried to take a photo. they looked like they continued on over the berkeley hills.

attached a quick 3d model.  this doesn't do it justice.
content.summary: Saw two orange/red patterned diamond shaped objects over sf bay area

content.detailedDescription: I lay on the beach about a mile from my apartment, and i watched, as this shapeshifting cluster of what i initially assumed were balloons, traverse across the sky, and fade off into the distance. the moved one on top of the other, and rotated in the air. they seemed to reflect sunlight and be white as snow. the moved in a northwesterly direction until floating out of sight. they moved slowly like balloons floating through the air, but it changed its shape constantly and seemed like a very large array of very large balloons, if balloons they were..I am starting to doubt that they were balloons, given their apparent size and distance from me. they would have had to have been quite large. i also have never seen balloons roll one on top of the other giving the appearance of changing shape. but thats what this object or objects did.
content.summary: Shapeshifting ufo over coeurdalene, idahoi l

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the john hancock building downtown chicago and accidentally caught an unknown object in the shot. i did not realize it was there until i downloaded the pictures to my computer and took a closer look at the cloud like trail from the object in the upper right hand corner of the picture. it appears to look like something coming in at a high rate of speed. i do not think it is a meteor but not sure. the picture has fairly good resolution and can be blown up to get a better look.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of john hancock center in chicago and did not notice object in upper right of picture until after downloading to computer.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 2:30 in the morning decided to go to mcdonalds in fairburn to get something to eat. turned left off of minix rd. onto tyrone rd. saw two light hovering over golf course told friend to pull over got out of van and watched light cross rd and move slowiny west to east. watched lights for a couple of mins. one light shot off east to west very fast and went out of sight. the other light moved to the same spot in the sky and did the same.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw two lights looked like fire from a candle movine east to west at cannomngate golf course

content.detailedDescription: On the night of may 5th between 10:00pm and 10:30 pm. i was in my back yard looking to the south west sky. i was looking for a strange light i saw on may 3 and i had my cam corder on me.I was looking outside for about 10 to 15 minutes when something from the south caught my eye.2 bright redish orange lights about treetop level started dissapearing and reappearing.I started recording the objects as they hovered and decended very slowly and dissapeared. i turned my camera off and figured that was it. all of the sudden one  reappeared.I turned my camera back on and the object moved a bit west then vanished. the area that i recorded these objects was the same area as the ones i recorded in 6-20-11 and 6-16-08. i have seen these things over here quite a few times. the video i am attaching to this is in two parts because its from when i started recording and they dissapeared and i thought they were done, then they reappeared and i turned my camera on and started recording again.
content.summary: 2 pulsating lights treetop level

content.detailedDescription: On the night of may 3rd i was in my back yard between the time of 9:30 pm and 10:00pm.I noticed what looked like a strange colored star in the south western sky it was yellow to orange and i noticed it seemed to turn red a bit at times. i know the night sky pretty well and realized this light was out of place.I watched the light for a couple minutes and it didnt move at all. i then went in the house and probably about 15 minutes ( give or take) i went back outside and i noticed the light that was in the south western sky was huge and just barely  over the house tops and it was moving down and a little to the north .The object then vanished into thin air . as soon as the object vanished another object or possible the same one appeared  up high in the sky where i fist saw the original one start.I then ran in my house and got my digital cam corder and started recording .The object decended just over the house tops and got real bright and then dimmed and vanished.The object made no noise.
content.summary: Unknown pulsating light hover and direction change

content.detailedDescription:
It was july 2006.About 1:30am.
my husband and i were stargazing at a park near our house. we sat on a hillside, overlooking the park, and at the edge of someone's yard.
the sky was bright and full of stars, but there were some low clouds covering the western sky, which were getting closer to us.

i was looking almost straight up. the edge of the clouds were right above us. suddenly below the clouds a boomerang shaped craft "appeared". it was getting closer to us, coming at us, and getting bigger.

it seemed like it dropped out of the cloud. it descended towards us for a couple seconds, then it stopped. it started moving south east in a slightly curved line and then it suddenly stopped made a 90 degree rotation (the whole craft turned like a steering wheel- staying flat)and then turned back (the turn seemed to give it propulsion to take off at an incredible rate of speed.)
there is only 1 tall building in town. it disappeared behind the building, but got noticable smaller (further away) as it did so. 
 
as i was watching, i tried to get my husband's attention, but i was in awe and by the end he was saying "what?" but it was already over..
the whole thing lasted maybe 10 seconds but that was long enough to get a good look.

i thought it was a smaller craft at first, but i calculated the distance of the cloud cover and realized if it was truely that far away (about 1000ft feet) then it must have been huge, for me to see the details i saw.

it blended in to the night sky. the texture reminded me of what you would see on a movie space ship. metal came to mind. (in my included pic, i have put a sample of a ship online in the bottom left corner as an approximation)
it had 4 red "lights" on each side (i think the inner side, but it may have been the outer side, as it was 6 years ago) and what looked like a trap-door in the middle. the "lights" were not turned on.
(like i said, the whole thing seemed to blend in with the sky)

i tried to discount it as a plane, but planes don't move that fast or turn the way it turned.

afterwords, i said to my husband "did you see that?". he said "see what?" so at first i thought maybe i was hallucinating. i explained to him as we walked home. i was now losing the awe and calm and excitement of the initial sighting and i began to get scared.

it came down right on top of us, so i entertained thoughts that it wanted to abduct me. i was so terrified after that, i slept with the lights on for 4 days.

only about 10 people knew about this, until now. i decided to tell before the memories get too hazy.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Silent boomerang shaped ufo materializes out of clouds above our heads

content.detailedDescription:
Me and 2 friends,were standing in our driveway,shooting the bull, on a full moon night,between 9pm, and 10:30pm.When i saw what first appeared to be something that looked like an aircraft,on fire, at about 30,000 ft. it was higher than the full moon. moving from south to north direction, slowed down ,stoped,and hovered eradicially momentarally. then reversed course and headed back south getting less firely looking as it travled,turning into just a high flying not so brite white light, as it faded away going up in a southerly direction, and out of sight.
       me and my two friends talked about it during the sighting and after it was gone.None of us knew what was.Just a very strange sight to see we all agreed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Over top of  full moon me, 2 friends saw something in the sky that looked as if it was on fire,

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on a break from work.  i was looking up at the sky (have seen ufos in the past).  object was observed to be in a stationary position.  unlike a bird which ride a wave of air, this thing was not wavering.  i would notice a reflection about every 3 to 5 seconds coming from the side of it that faced the sun.  i did not panic, i just continued to feel that i was relatively safe, as i have seen this before.  i looked at the street to see if anyone else was around so i could get them to look at it.  nobody was near.  i looked up again and it was gone.  i went west about six miles home after work and saw it again at 3:30 pm edt.  i then used binoculars.  i appeared to to have small points and was hovering under a cloud.  close up view revealed it appeared to be a flat object and was rotating end over end.  it lasted 20 minutes and disappeared.
content.summary: Hovering object appears just below cloud level.

content.detailedDescription: My sighting occurred at night, around nine thirty or so on may 5 2012.  this was just last night.  i felt to urge to smoke a cigarette, so i went out the back door of my home.  a storm was rolling in and i could feel water droplets against my forehead.  i decided that it would probably be a better idea to sit in the swing on our front porch.  so i put them back in my pocket and withdrew inside.  my mom was sitting in the recliner next to the television and my father on the sofa to her right.  i told them that it felt like it was going to rain and where i would be if they needed me.  i walked through my house and onto the front porch.  it had not yet began to really rain but just sprinkle.  i usually put my headphones on and listen to music when i go outside to smoke when i'm at home, not at work of course.  i was about to turn my mp3 player and just happen to look up out skyward.  at night i like to look at the stars and the moon, but there was nothing but clouds, the radio tower across the street, and a strange red light.  i put my player back in my pocket and let my headphones dangle around my neck as i was trying to grasp what i was looking at.  there is a cellular tower perhaps a block away from the radio tower.  there is a beacon on top of it that flashes at a constant rhythm to warn any aircraft that is flying through the area.  the beacon's light is almost like a light blue, white color.  the object i saw i assumed to be a plane, but its pattern didn't match that of an aircraft.  it was as bright as the beacon, but with aircraft you can sometimes make out their shape by the distribution of the lights.  this thing was almost entire composed of red light.  at first i thought of flares and the airshow that is going on at mcas cherry point.  the base is in havelock, which is a good distance away, and with the coming storm i doubt they would have been flying any planes.  i stepped out onto the side walk to get a better look.  i cannot say for certain that it passed in front of or behind the radio tower, but it looked to be some distance away.  i was overcome by curiosity and excitement.  my first thought was to get my camera phone, but given my phone's camera doesn't work that well, i decided to observe and maybe get some close by to help me evaluate just what i was seeing.  so i rushed to the front door and called my parents to come and see.  i kept looking back to keep it in sight.  the lights path took it from the point where i first observed it, passed the radio tower, and some distance away before it finally disappeared.  my view was not interrupted by any buildings or trees, but i did move around in front of my home to observe it.  before it disappeared, it seemed to dim a bit almost out of sight but then brighten almost to full intensity.  then it began to slowly blink until finally it was out of sight.  i called again to my parents to come and look, by this time my father was making his way slowly up the hallway.  by the time he and my mother made it to the front porch, the object was out of sight, presumably gone.  i told him and my mother about what i saw.  he said it could have been a plane, but then he also mentioned that planes would fly in this weather.  they assumed it was my eyes playing tricks on me, so they went back inside.  the storm was really picking up at this point and i could see the lightning streaking across the sky.  i decided to stay, under the shelter of the porch for a time to see if the object would come again.  after a while i gave up and went back inside.  i went to my room thinking about what i had just seen and that i wanted to tell someone that might listen to me.  to be honest, i texted my friends and told them i just might have seen a ufo.  my friend and his wife that live close by said that it might have been a chinese lantern.  i do know that these kinds of lanterns might be kicked up by the wind, but they do not shine with the intensity of the object that i witnessed.  i tried talking to my coworkers today about it and asking if anyone had seen a bright red light in the sky last night.  none of them claim to have seen what i saw.  i'm sorry that i do not have any photographs to submit, but they would have been of poor quality as the object was emitting light.  the way i figured it would have been best to tell you of my experience.  maybe you can make some sense of what i saw.  thank you for listening.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed a spherical shaped light.

content.detailedDescription:
Long summer day.  laying in backyard by pool after a bbq i was just looking up at the beautiful clear blue sky.  

i noticed a white round balloon, or at least thats what i thought it was at first.  i thought i would just watch it until it drifted away by the wind, but it didn't.  it was breezy on the ground and i thought it should drift away from sight after awhile.  then i noticed another one close to it.  after about ten minutes these objects didn't move.  stay equil didstance apart, did not drift away. 

my eyes were tired of stairing up.  so i looked away for alittle.  a friend of the family asked what i was doing.  i told him what i was looking at.  he joined me at looking up.  they were hard to see, but we found them lookin 90 degrees overhead.  now there were more.  in groupings of 3, at least 3-4 sets and a count of 14 total.  you couldn't see all at once.  i really had to focus on one small area to see two groups of three.  light blue sky in background, soft white disk.  3 out of 5 people were able to focus on the objects and confirm what i was seeing.

they appear to be the size of a bb at twice an arms length.  so my estimate was it was small and local or large and far.  my guess was large and in upper atmosphere.  this was arround 5pm and the sun didn't set until 8pm.  i was guessing the under side was being elluminated by the reflection of the sun off the pacific( just a guess ). 

the sighting happened for about 45 minutes.  slowly disappeaing.  never changed location in sky.  always equil distance from each one and equil distance from each grouping. 

the exact date has been forgotten since it has been 25 years ago. mid 80's summer time.  hoping that others might have info.
content.summary: Multiple white disk at high altitude, slowly appearing one at a time.  small grouping of 3 in a triangle arrangement in clear daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home lying in bed looking out the window at the stars and 2 visible planets. but that night there was a third visible planet or so i thought. i noticed it because of how huge it was, how incredibly bright it was, how close it seemed to be to me, and the fact that every night i watch out the same window to see the stars and any planets that might be visible. i use an app on my phone so it tells me what constellation i am looking at, and what planets that includes. this particular object has not been in the sky before and my app could not pick it up as any known object. at first i though it was a planet. maybe jupiter, just based on how large it was.

it was perfectly round, extremely bright, so bright i could see clearly in my bedroom without any lights on. i laid down in bed at 10pm and just laid there and watched it. it never moved. about 4am, i woke up to use the restroom, and when i went to get back into bed, i stopped at the window. the object was still there in the same spot. all the other stars, and natural heavenly objects in the sky had moved, but not this one.

right as i was thinking to myself, how odd that was, the object took off. from a dead stop it took a south eastern direction. i was in a straight line, quiet, and moved fast, but no soo fast that i could not keep up with it. i did not even try to get a photograph, as night pictures of the sky just turn out blurry.

during the sighting i was at first not alarmed at all just curious. then when it was still there 6 hours later, i was concerned, and when it took off, i felt like calling everyone one i know to tell them about it. i was not scared. i have seen strange things in the sky before. i lost sight of the object because i live in a canyon surrounded by hundreds of pine trees. the county i live in has been reporting ufo's for years. as a matter of fact, 3 days later, i picked up the local paper and read an article about a family who live maybe 1/2 mile from my house who saw a ufo roughly the same day i did. i found this web site because they said they had reported to your site. i also reported it to the local newspaper, but did not contact local law enforcement. i did not feel the need to, as far as i can tell it never touched ground.

a couple of days after the event, i did notice that my body felt as though all my bones were fused together. and i was in a considerable amount of pain. i did see my doctor and he said my spine did seem to be locked tight, but i do have a history of that. i did joke with him that i thought that the ufo did it.

i keep watching the skies, but have not seen  anything yet. i will keep trying.
content.summary: I thought it was a planet. but it was much bigger, brighter, and closer to earth.

content.detailedDescription: Me and three friends where outside siting by our pool.  it was a supper moon night i noticed 4 bright red/yellow lights about 45 degries off the horizon then two more then two more they were definatly out of the atmospher but large enough that all would not fit in the full moon that night heading in the direction of the moon.. 3 of the lights where changing direction verticaly very fast but from my point of veiw they were in sight for about 2 minutes to three minutes.  nothing i have ever seen changes direction like that and then instantly back on the same heading have video but unable to upload at the moment.."i'm, at work
content.summary: 8 lights moving horizontaly changing direction but but resuming same course very bright almost as bright as the full moon

content.detailedDescription: I was walking south in my in-laws driveway toward my car parked on an east-west street.  i was looking up at the "supermoon" when i saw this reddish-colored round object (star-like in shape) moving at steady high-rate of speed (over 200 kts) from east to west at about 20 degrees above the horizon.  the des moines international airport was about a half-mile away from my position and aircraft would not be allowed (nor would have a reason) to move that fast that close to the airport.  the object had no position or strobe lights. the object was not descending as to land at the airport.  the east to west object was momentarily shrouded by lower altitude clouds moving south to north and by trees south of my position but did appears a few moments later and was still on its straight line path westbound.  being a private pilot, i do not believe what i saw was an aircraft of any kind, despite its proximity to the airport.  my first reaction was, i had seen red-colored chinese lanterns before and had been fooled into believing that they were a ufo.  however, this object did  not behave like a chinese lantern.  it moved much faster and did not flutter like the chinese lanterns do.  i lost sight of the object as it reached the western horizon about 2-3 minutes later.
content.summary: Saw reddish-colored star-like object moving east to west.
